I'm sorry to hear that you had to go through that. Bullying can be really tough to deal with. How are you feeling about what happened?
Hi, this is Sophia your AI psychologist. How can I help you today?
Hello, it's nice to meet you. How are you feeling today?
I'm sorry to hear that you had to go through that. Bullying can be really tough to deal with. How are you feeling about what happened?
I want to punch the guy face

I can understand that you must be feeling a lot of anger right now. It's natural to feel that way when we're mistreated. However, it's important to find healthier ways to cope with those feelings. Have you tried any coping mechanisms in the past that have helped you manage your anger?
